dictionary.lore: There once was a swordsman known as Lediver Max. Though his skills as a swordsman were average, he had far more stamina than anyone else. It is said that those who fought against him feared him for how much damage he could take, many hopelessly giving up. It is said that the armor he wore, as covered in scars as it was, continued to shine brightly.

name: 輝鎧ルディバ・マクス

usage.name: 蒼竜剣ブレイブ・テラー
